sentence: Judging by East Coast liberals' attacks on Florida Governor Ron DeSantis for fighting against woke math textbooks, you'd think the battle is a new one.
author: Jason Rantz
title: 'Math is Racist' Crowd Runs Rampant in Seattle, Portland | Opinion

sentence: Amazon and other companies have been eager to distance themselves from the end of Roe, since they haven't forked over cash to make Ron DeSantis president yet and so Ron hasn't been able to pass new nationwide laws punishing them for doing so.
author:
Hunter
Daily Kos Staff
title: These are some of the companies that funded the end of Roe v. Wade
